Trigger Dream Aethusa has been dead for 10 minutes

Effect Dream Aethusa's body is consumed with mythic energy, transforming into a comet with three blazing tails. All creatures within 120 feet must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:40] save to resist becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 minute (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] permanently on a critical failure). The hazard then rolls initiative.

details.description: A blazing comet with three tails—one red, one black, and one with rainbow hues—careens throughout the area.
details.disable: @Check[athletics|dc:48] (legendary) to grab one of the comet's tails and rip it free; @Check[occultism|dc:45] or @Check[religion|dc:45] (master) to exorcise the divine energy of the red tail (which is infused with Gorum's legacy) or the black tail (infused with the nihilism of Abaddon's Eclipse); @Check[arcana|dc:45] (master) to unweave the magic of the rainbow tail (Xanderghul's mythic power); or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (9th rank; counteract DC 36) to counteract one of the tails. Each tail must be disabled separately to disable the hazard.

publication.title: Pathfinder Adventure Path #220: Crypt of Runes

details.reset:
(1 action) The Trinity Star flies at a speed of 60 feet, moving through the spaces of as many creatures as possible. Each creature the Trinity Star moves through must make a @Check[reflex|dc:42] save with the following results.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[6d6[force]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[11d6[force]] damage and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[22d6[force]] damage, is knocked prone, and if the creature is mythic, they lose 1 Mythic Point. If the Trinity Star has lost any of its tails, it regrows one of them (chosen at random if it's lost two tails).
